Description: AWS Cloud Formation Template for creating and initiating the formation of a F5 WAF Cluster.

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance

SSHLocation.Description: The IP address range that can be used to SSH to the EC2 instances
SSHLocation.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

licenseToken1.Description: (Required) The License Token for the first BYOL F5 Web Application Firewall.
licenseToken1.ConstraintDescription: Please verify your F5 BYOL regkey.

licenseToken2.Description: (Optional) The License Token for the second BYOL F5 Web Application Firewall if applicable.
licenseToken2.ConstraintDescription: Please verify your F5 BYOL regkey.

licenseToken3.Description: (Optional) The License Token for the third BYOL F5 Web Application Firewall if applicable.
licenseToken3.ConstraintDescription: Please verify your F5 BYOL regkey.

licenseToken4.Description: (Optional) The License Token for the fourth BYOL F5 Web Application Firewall if applicablbe.
licenseToken4.ConstraintDescription: Please verify your F5 BYOL regkey.

BigIPInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid Big-IP EC2 instance type.
